full_text: This is a really cute little baby blanket Just 15” x 15” - for a Premature or Angel baby - or doll Fun to knit ! Requires ~ DK yarn - around 70g 4mm needles Tension/Gauge ~ 24sts = 4” (10cm) Easy to adjust for bigger sizes - Stitches given for 18”, 24” and 30” baby blankets So sweet PLEASE NOTE ** There was originally an error in this pattern ~ The purl rows should read S1, k5, purl to last 6sts, k6 Sorry. I have corrected the instructions now. To get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓
name: Ravelry: Jordan Baby Blanket pattern by marianna mel
